title: Photos: Halle Berry Shines at Crime 101 Movie Premiere in London - Sandra Rose
text:
Oscar winner Halle Berry stunned in an age-defying outfit at the London premiere of Crime 101.
Halle, 59, turned heads in a black bodysuit with plunging neckline and a silver metallic chainmail maxi skirt on Wednesday, January 28.
She wore her hair styled in long, wavy brown locks with bangs.
The mom-of-2 accessorized with a silver floral pendant and a long black trench coat to keep warm in London’s frigid weather.
Halle stars as Sharon, a disillusioned insurance broker, who encounters an elusive high-profile thief (Chris Hemsworth) in Crime 101. As their paths cross, a relentless detective trails them hoping to stop the multi-million dollar heist they are planning together.
Crime 101, set in Los Angeles, also stars Barry Keoghan, Monica Barbaro, Corey Hawkins, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Nick Nolte.
Halle’s skin glowed at the premiere, thanks to her strict skincare regimen.
She previously told Page Six that it was a “privilege to age” while promoting her skincare product, Lancôme Rénergie C.R.x. Triple Serum Retinol.
Halle said her skin was “drier than it ever used to be” due to hormonal changes in perimenopause. Then she found the peptide-based skin product that changed her life.
“I love that I’m more confident than I’ve ever been,” she said. “I feel good in my skin; I’ve taken care of my skin.”
Crime 101 opens in theaters on Feb. 13.
